research_context.focus: Agent Communication Protocol (ACP) and Agent-to-Agent Protocol (A2A)
research_context.research_objective: Develop protocol adaptation framework and evaluation methodology

research_alignment.description: Alignment with ACP/A2A protocol research objectives

prior_research_credibility.description: Evidence of successful usage in related research

integration_potential.description: Potential for integration with other methodologies

design_science_research.name: Design Science Research (DSR)
design_science_research.purpose: Create and evaluate artifacts to solve identified problems
strengths: Strong alignment with protocol development objectives
Systematic approach to artifact creation and evaluation
Well-established in IS and technology research
Combines theoretical rigor with practical application
Clear evaluation criteria and validation methods
limitations: Limited stakeholder integration in traditional DSR
May not capture all contextual factors
design_science_research.acp_a2a_application: Develop ACP/A2A adaptation framework as research artifact with systematic evaluation

grounded_theory.name: Grounded Theory Methodology
grounded_theory.purpose: Develop theory about protocol adoption and usage patterns
grounded_theory.acp_a2a_application: Limited suitability for technical protocol research

phenomenological.name: Phenomenological Research Methodology
phenomenological.purpose: Understand lived experiences of protocol users
limitations: Focus on experiences vs technical performance
phenomenological.acp_a2a_application: Not suitable for technical protocol research objectives

sequential_explanatory.name: Sequential Explanatory Mixed Methods
sequential_explanatory.purpose: Use quantitative results to drive qualitative investigation for deeper understanding
limitations: Timeline risk if quantitative phase delayed
sequential_explanatory.acp_a2a_application: DSR protocol development followed by case studies to explain performance results

convergent_parallel.name: Convergent Parallel Mixed Methods
convergent_parallel.purpose: Simultaneous quantitative and qualitative investigation with integration
convergent_parallel.acp_a2a_application: Simultaneous DSR development and case study investigation

sequential_exploratory.name: Sequential Exploratory Mixed Methods
sequential_exploratory.purpose: Use qualitative exploration to inform quantitative investigation
sequential_exploratory.acp_a2a_application: Case studies inform DSR design and evaluation criteria

digital_twin.name: Digital Twin Methodology
digital_twin.purpose: Create digital replicas for comprehensive protocol testing and validation
digital_twin.acp_a2a_application: Create digital twins of DER maintenance systems for protocol performance testing
